pm.gloss: an examination and dissection of a dead body to determine cause of death or the changes produced by disease
a soft silvery metallic element of the rare earth group having no stable isotope
the person who holds the position of head of the government in the United Kingdom

pms.gloss: a syndrome that occurs in many women from 2 to 14 days before the onset of menstruation
